QUAD SINE LFO
OUTPUTS FOUR SINE WAVES
FREQ RATIOS ~ SQRT(5)
PARAM SETS BASE FREQ
BETWEEN 0.016 AND 7.8 HZ
CV ALSO CONTROLS FREQ
TR1 RESETS ALL LFOS
TR2 FREEZES ALL LFOS



#1
PN.I 0 0
L 1 3: PN 1 I 0
L 1 4: CV.SET I PN.HERE 0
SYNC 0

#2
X 2; Y 8; Z 2
EVERY X: $ 3
X 5; Y 17; Z 3
EVERY X: $ 3
X 11; Y 14; Z 4
EVERY X: $ 3

#3
J WRAP + PN 1 Z 1 0 63
SKIP Y: K P J; PN 1 Z J
OTHER: K AVG P PN 1 Z P J
CV.SLEW Z * 2 * M X; CV Z K

#4
TR 1 GTE CV 1 CV 4
TR 2 GTE CV 1 CV 3
TR 3 GTE CV 3 CV 4
TR 4 GTE CV 3 CV 2

#5

#6

#7

#8

#M
IF OR STATE 1 STATE 2: BREAK
K / EXP - 16129 + PRM IN 16
K MAX 2 K; M! K; K * 2 K
CV.SLEW 1 K; CV 1 P.NEXT
$ 2; $ 4

#I
PARAM.SCALE 0 16383
IN.SCALE 0 16383
L 2 4: MUTE I
$ 1; P.N 0; M.ACT 1

#P
64	64	64	64
1	1	1	1
0	0	0	0
63	63	63	63
